columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the assessment template.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN of the assessment template.

columns.name: assessment_run_count
columns.description: The number of existing assessment runs associated with this assessment template.

columns.name: assessment_target_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the assessment target that corresponds to this assessment template.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The time at which the assessment template is created.

columns.name: duration_in_seconds
columns.description: The duration in seconds specified for this assessment template.

columns.name: last_assessment_run_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the most recent assessment run associated with this assessment template.

columns.name: rules_package_arns
columns.description: The rules packages that are specified for this assessment template.

columns.name: user_attributes_for_findings
columns.description: The user-defined attributes that are assigned to every generated finding from the assessment run that uses this assessment template.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags associated with the Assessment Template.

columns.name: event_subscriptions
columns.description: A list of event subscriptions associated with the Assessment Template.
